@anonymous_never-watchhentai And that's the whole fucking point! These vanillafags are trying so hard to "canonize a relationship" between the stupid bland player-character MC and Kokkoro mama, when as you've said that he can't because of his design philosophy. It's kinda no different than the Persona MCs (but that is an insult to them because at least they can date their girls/prospects). This bitch cuck can't even date them. He doesn't do anything. So what's the point of having a harem MC in a harem who won't even tackle his harem? He's nothing more than a motherfucking chaperone. He's just a pair of lenses for players to view the world and not really matter/interact with it. So don't take it up with me. I already know what's his damage. You should be taking it up with these mentally ill delusional vanilla cucks who think that it's actually canon that he could/would score one of them, specifically Kokkoro, when again like we both agreed that that couldn't be further from the truth...

They seem to have forgotten that plenty of hentai, from tentacles, rape, hypnosis to loli/shota and even Vanilla all operate on illogical concepts. Where in the real world would you ever find situations like them? If they have even further forgotten, even anime/mangas all operate on illogical fantasies. When is animes like Demon Slayer or Attack on Titan even remotely logical?? I'd say they really forgotten where they are...
